statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, price FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, product_name, barcode FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity < 50 AND price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM barcodes;
SELECT id, barcode FROM barcodes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT barcode_id, item_name FROM inventory INNER JOIN barcodes ON inventory.barcode_id = barcodes.id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM barcodes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT item_name, barcode FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM barcodes INNER JOIN inventory ON barcodes.id = inventory.barcode_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT DISTINCT barcode_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory GROUP BY barcode_id HAVING total_items > 5 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM Barcode_System ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_threshold;
SELECT barcode_id, product_category FROM Barcode_System WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Supplier%';
SELECT * FROM Barcode_System ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Barcode_System WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE quantity_change < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier' ORDER BY quantity_on_hand DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_on_hand, reorder_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE quantity_on_hand < reorder_threshold ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, barcode FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT p.name, i.quantity, i.location FROM Products p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, p.name, t.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN Products p ON t.product_id = p.id;
SELECT id, name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, t.quantity AS sold_quantity, u.username AS sold_by FROM Products p JOIN Transactions t ON p.id = t.product_id JOIN Users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' OR name LIKE '%banana%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM products;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT warehouse_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouses JOIN shipments ON warehouses.warehouse_id = shipments.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
